summary:
Realistic Ores in HD!
Modification changes models, textures, physics and effects of ORES on more realistic in HD.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Realistic Ores in HD![/size][/color][/b]


[size=5][color=#00ff00]Modification changes:[/color]
[/size]
[size=3] - Models (remodeled and smoothed)
 - Textures (diffuse, normal, specular, environment)
 - Physics (more realistic)
 - Effects (normal, specular, environment)[/size]


[color=#00ff00][size=5]What ores are changed:
[/size][/color][size=4][color=#b6b6b6]- Iron Ore[/color]
[color=#d8d8d8]- Silver Ore[/color]
[color=#ffd966]- Gold Ore[/color]
[color=#c27ba0]- Corundum Ore[/color]
[color=#6aa84f]- Malachite Ore[/color][/size]
[size=4][color=#3c78d8]- Ebony Ore[/color]
[color=#ead1dc]- Quicksilver Ore[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]- Orichalcum Ore[/color]
[color=#fff2cc]- Moonstone Ore[/color]
[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=4]Instalation:[/size]
[/color]
[/font][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]Copy the Data folder and overwrite it with the existing one in the main game folder.
[/font][/size]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]A NEW BIG UPDATE IS COMING!
[youtube]dRUA2y0hwTI[/youtube][/size][/color][/b]
[/font]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/DPZBj9Q.jpg[/img]
